page.title: 06LIFESTYLE DIARY
page.content: My name is Elanor and I am ten years old. On school days I get up and have breakfast of cereal. By 08.35 I am on my way to school. When the whistle goes at 08.55, we go for Assembly. Later we begin our Mathematics. At 10.35 we have our playtime, after which we do some English work. Lunch break is from 12.00 to 13.30 when we get changed for Physical Education. We then have a break followed by Storytime. School finishes at 15.45 when I go home, get changed and watch my favourite television programme called "Blue Peter". I have my dinner of sausages and chips at 18.30 when my father returns from his work in London. After having a bath I get ready for bed, where I read before sleeping.
